title: Emission of Precum Fajr time was ending cleaned, prayed Later noticed mathi on clothes Prayer valid?
transcript: uh uh Chef I had a question regarding f f prayer um when I woke up once I had like it's not continuous but like a temporary emission of Med but the prayer time um was about to end and I didn't know what to do so I decided to just clean up and then then pray but then after the prayer if I see Med I saw medy on my my uh garment so I wasn't sure I wasn't sure if it came out during the prayer or after the prayer so what should I do in this case nothing alhamdulillah Allah says fear to the best of your ability and whenever the time is about to um be over and you still have a mission of NASA that breaks your W and you've tried your level best you just simply clean yourself and pray and whatever is is emitted during the prayer uh um has no impact on it and the prayer is valid inshallah
